Teltoli noticed Carnage walk away from the battle, and she sighed 
internally. Why didn't she herself think of that?

Stepping off Instrat and flapping her wings, the Fuzor rose higher 
into the the sky and turned her cloaking on, so no-one could see her. 
Teltoli watched the trees with emerald eyes, hoping she could catch 
sight of her friend among the cover.

Smelling a faint scent of animal blood, she dove lower and picked up 
the form of Carnage, lunching on boar. Teltoli smiled and turned her 
cloaking off, landing a few meters away and neatly folding her wings 
across her back.

"Um, sorry for that back there.. I kinda got carried away. This whole 
day has been so stressful! I mean, first I come out of my Ship, and 
get attacked by practically the whole Alliance fleet. Then I try go 
to Maximal Base for help, but they take soooo long in actually 
getting off their asses, and their ship is still getting attacked. 
So, I started another Alliance/Maximal war.." The Fuzor sighs.

"And 'then', I come to find you, and this stupid bot starts 
attacking, and my rage just sorta bubbled over. You know how it is.." 
She trailed off, slightly uneasy by the silence.

Teltoli shifted her front paws. "I hope you're not mad at me for 
leaving before.. I did what I had to do.."

The Fuzor trailed off again, the end of her voice giving way to the 
sounds of the forest and her own breathing inside her ears.
